00019 #ifndef DATABASE_SITEMAP_HEADER_FILE_INCLUDED
00020 #define DATABASE_SITEMAP_HEADER_FILE_INCLUDED
00021 
00022 #include <Sitemap.H>
00023 #include <TransformableTrimesh.H>
00024 #include <ImmovableTrimesh.H>
00025 
00026 namespace SimSite3D{
00027 
00029 
00032 class DbaseSitemap : public Sitemap{
00033 public:
00034   DbaseSitemap(const std::string path, const std::string struct_id,
00035                const BaseParameters& args, 
00036                const my_float_t max_corr_surf_pt_dist_in=1.5,
00037                const bool check_all_triangles = false, 
00038                const bool load_hbond_surfaces = false)
00039     : Sitemap(path, struct_id, args, false, load_hbond_surfaces, false,
00040               VERBOSE_SILENT)
00041   { 
00042     init();
00043     A_max_corr_surf_pt_dist = max_corr_surf_pt_dist_in;
00044     if(args.load_surf_files && 
00045        !load_surface_mesh(struct_id, check_all_triangles)){
00046       set_fail_flag(true);
00047       return;
00048     }
00049   }
00050 
00051   ~DbaseSitemap()
00052   { clear(); } 
00053 
00054   const geometry::SimpleTrimeshTwo&
00055   binding_site_mesh_handle() const
00056   { return *A_binding_site_mesh; }
00057 
00058   const my_float_t
00059   max_corr_surf_pt_dist() const
00060   { return A_max_corr_surf_pt_dist; }
00061 
00062 private:
00063 
00064   bool
00065   load_surface_mesh(const std::string struct_id, const bool check_all_triangles)
00066   {
00067     std::string surf_fname = site_path() + "/" + struct_id + "_surf";
00068     if(check_all_triangles){
00069       std::cout << "Allocating TransformableTrimesh for: " << struct_id << "\n";
00070       A_binding_site_mesh = new geometry::TransformableTrimesh(surf_fname);
00071     }else{
00072       std::cout << "Allocating ImmovableTrimesh for: " << struct_id << "\n";
00073        A_binding_site_mesh = 
00074          new geometry::ImmovableTrimesh(surf_fname, A_max_corr_surf_pt_dist);
00075     }
00076 
00077     if(A_binding_site_mesh->fail()){
00078       std::cerr << "Unable to load the surface mesh" << std::endl;
00079       return false;
00080     }
00081     return true;
00082   }
00083 
00085   void 
00086   clear()
00087   { 
00088     if(A_binding_site_mesh) delete A_binding_site_mesh;
00089     init(); 
00090   }
00091 
00094   void 
00095   init()
00096   { 
00097     A_binding_site_mesh = 0; 
00098     A_max_corr_surf_pt_dist = 1.5;
00099   }
00100 
00101   my_float_t A_max_corr_surf_pt_dist;
00102   geometry::SimpleTrimeshTwo *A_binding_site_mesh;
00103 };
00104 
00105 } // end namespace SimSite3D
00106 
00107 #endif
